ElementLabel: Please state whether you are a parent or a guardian
Please state whether you hold a residence order which was in force immediately before the care order was made (Section 34(1)(c) Children Act 1989)
Please state whether you had care of the child(ren) through an order which was in force immediately before the care order was made (Section 34(1)(d) Children Act 1989)
The order applied for and your reason(s) for the application
If you are relying on a report or other documentary evidence state the date(s) and author(s) and enclose a copy in the upload documents section
